name: .RESOURCE File Extension
summary: Learn about .RESOURCE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: RESOURCE files are not meant to be opened. Instead, Unity-based games and applications reference the files to load content.

Advanced users and modders may attempt to extract data from RESOURCE files using third-party tools designed to unpack Unity assets, such as AssetStudio. However, modifying RESOURCE files can break a game or violate its terms of service.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
